aa2.title: Equity & Diversity
aa2.details: This Laravel application is used by CSUN HR to keep track of staff hires.

etd.title: ETD
etd.details: This Laravel application is used by both CSUN Master's Students and academic advisors to keep track and manage the Masters Student's thesis progress from start to finish.

faculty.title: Faculty
faculty.description: Get to know CSUN's unique Faculty.
faculty.details: This Laravel application is used to highlight CSUN's diverse Faculty as well as serve as a hub for students to easily find their Faculty's office hours, sillabi, research interests, and contact information.

scholarship.title: Scholarship
scholarship.description: Showcasing CSUN's Faculty projects, research & expertise.
scholarship.details: This Laravel application showcases the many projects that are happening throughout the campus. CSUN individuals have the ability to join the project as a student, staff or faculty and display that fact to the world.

mom.title: META+LAB Website
mom.details: CSUN META+LAB website explains what META+LAB is and what our primary product is - our students.

web_services.title: Web Services
web_services.details: The CSUN META+LAB web services provide an easy way to get you up and running on your next CSUN application.
